topic.title: References to IFRSs that apply to typical types of public‑to‑private arrangements

p.i: This note accompanies, but is not part of, IFRIC 12.

body.p: The table sets out the typical types of arrangements for private sector participation in the provision of public sector services and provides references to IFRSs that apply to those arrangements. The list of arrangements types is not exhaustive. The purpose of the table is to highlight the continuum of arrangements. It is not the IFRIC’s intention to convey the impression that bright lines exist between the accounting requirements for public‑to‑private arrangements.
